user@localhost:~/test$ singularity deal send-manual client provider piece_cid 1024

<nil>   proposed  f01       bafkreie7q3iidccmpvszul7kudcvvuavuo7u6gzlbobczuk5nqk3b4akba  1024       1001        0      true      client_id
